name: Scrumball
tagline: Influencer marketing AI agent with 120M creator database
description: Launch influencer campaigns within minutes with your AI team. Lillian, Hunter & Charlie handle brand analysis, creator discovery, outreach automation, and ROI tracking from 120M+ database. We manage everything, so you focus on growth.

name: Fakeradar
tagline: Real-time deepfake protection for video calls
description: FakeRadar.io protects your sensitive data by instantly detecting whether you’re speaking with a real person or a deepfake — in real time, with just one click. Stay confident in every conversation and be sure the person on screen is truly who they claim to be.

name: Neutron
tagline: Proactive desktop AI that helps before you ask
description: Neutron is your desktop AI assistant. It can see what’s on your screen, preemptively offer you help, write, summarize, or read from any app. Don't download another Chrome extension or browser, just use Neutron directly in your existing workflow.

name: Figma MCP
tagline: Design context, everywhere you build
description: Figma's MCP server now has remote access, making your design context portable. Bring live design system and layout info directly into your IDE and AI agents. This update also adds support for Figma Make and improves Code Connect.

name: textbehindvideo.io
tagline: Create cinematic text behind video designs easily
description: tebehindvideo.io lets you layer stylised text behind your video content—no design skills required. Generate cinematic behind-text visuals and instantly apply them to social posts, promos, and stories.

name: AdMesh
tagline: Promote Products inside AI Conversations
description: We believe the future of ads isn’t banners or pop-ups — it’s intent-driven recommendations inside AI conversations. AdMesh is an AI-native ad network that helps brands promote products at the exact moment of intent.

name: ChatGPT Pulse
tagline: Now ChatGPT can start the conversation
description: It is a new feature for Pro mobile users that gives you daily updates made just for you. It learns from your chats, feedback, and connected apps to share useful cards each day, so you can stay informed and reach your goals faster.

name: Pieter™
tagline: Windows 3.11 retro computer with dial-up internet
description: Windows 3.11 retro computer with working dial-up modem internet with Winsock that lives inside your browser by @levelsio

name: Nansen AI
tagline: A Crypto Research Team In Your Pocket, 24/7
description: Nansen AI is the first truly agentic investing app - a research team in your pocket, 24/7. Powered by 500M+ labeled addresses, get the full picture of onchain in the palm of your hands.

name: Open Notebook
tagline: Open source NotebookLM alternative
description: All the familiar UI of NotebookLM but with fully customizable apps like video generators, podcast creators, and more. Remix existing apps or create your own.

name: Agent Compass
tagline: Your AI Agent's Truth Graph to diagnose symptoms
description: Turn raw traces into actionable reliability insights: auto-cluster recurring failures and hallucinations, link them to root causes with guided fixes, and track agent-level performance over time across cohorts and user journeys.

name: Vibes
tagline: Super cringey AI slop that Zuck loves
description: Vibes is designed to make it easier to find creative inspiration and experiment with Meta AI’s media tools. As you browse, you’ll see a range of AI-generated videos from creators and communities.

name: RevenueTrack
tagline: Clean, fast revenue analytics for Mac app developers
description: Tired of App Store Connect’s slow, cluttered dashboard? RevenueTrack is a macOS app that gives you: - Live sales, downloads, and net revenue - Best/worst days and rolling averages - Multi-app comparison and global sales view

name: Polarity
tagline: Push Code like a 10x Engineer.
description: Polarity helps engineers ship code 10x faster with 10x the quality.

name: BEANCONQUEROR
tagline: Unleash your inner coffee alchemist
description: Beanconqueror is a free coffee tracking app that helps optimize brewing. Track beans, log brews (V60, Aeropress, espresso, etc), manage roasts, save water recipes, and connect to bluetooth scales and more for live data. Perfect for coffee enthusiasts.

name: Blook
tagline: Blook is a super simple way to publish your blog
description: Blook is a super simple way to publish your blog, turn your book into a website, or share your newsletter online. It’s powered by Lume, fast and simple static site generator for Deno. Demo: This is the Spanish version of my newsletter jlantunez.com/columnas

name: DeepClue
tagline: AI-powered deduction game platform
description: A text-based interactive deduction game platform. Stories are crafted by real writers logical and well-designed, while characters performed by AI, every question is different, they may lie, hide, or mislead. Predictable story. Unpredictable dialogue.

name: DIMO
tagline: The vehicle data platform that puts privacy first
description: Build the future of mobility with DIMO — the open developer platform for cars. Access live vehicle data, integrate AI, and create apps for drivers, fleets, and EVs. Open-source, fast, and community-driven.

name: Open Source AI Chrome Extension
tagline: Chrome extension allow the user to communicate with the AI
description: 🤖 Key Features: AI Chat - Talk to Google Gemini AI on any website Screenshot Analysis - Capture and analyze any part of a webpage Compare Mode - Compare responses from multiple AI models at once Define Prompt Template - Define your own prompt template

name: 2Camera
tagline: Dual Capture: Front & Back Camera (iPhone 11+, iOS 17+)
description: 2Camera is a powerful dual-camera app that lets you shoot and record with front and back cameras at the same time. ※ Support more iPhones: 11,12,13,14,15,16,17 series, iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad mini, and more. ※ Support more iOS: 17, iOS 18, and iOS 26.

name: Scrumball
tagline: Influencer marketing AI agent with 120M creator database
description: Launch influencer campaigns within minutes with your AI team. Lillian, Hunter & Charlie handle brand analysis, creator discovery, outreach automation, and ROI tracking from 120M+ database. We manage everything, so you focus on growth.
